title: How to upgrade my iPhone 11 to 12 - Quora

response.answer_text: If you go to the Apple Store, if it is still accepting customers, you will have to schedule a shopping time and you’ll do the whole process there. If it you an Express pick up Apple Store or if you order online, you’ll pay the full price for the iPhone and then they send you a box to send in your previous device to Apple. After their evaluation is complete, they refund the amount of the trade in value back on your original method of payment. So, if you buy the iPhone 12 for $799, you’ll pay the full $799 and if you’re trading in an iPhone 11 for $350, after they check it out, you’ll get that $350 back and you’d be charged $449 instead (before taxes).

It depends on the models. If u have an iPhone 11 pro max and you want to buy just an iPhone 12 or iPhone 12 mini u can exchange them easy. But you won’t get the iPhone 12 exchanged with an iPhone 11. U need to have something that is not cheaper than the iPhone 12.
